_comment: This is a PLACEHOLDER Firebase configuration file.
_step1: 1. Create a Firebase project at https://console.firebase.google.com
_step2: 2. Add an Android app with your applicationId from androidApp/build.gradle.kts
_step3: 3. Download the real google-services.json and replace this file
_note: The app will build and run without Firebase, but push notifications won't work until configured.
